Well this movie is released under axxo. How can anyone else determine who axxo is? We can make resonable assumptions of who axxo is but maybe axxo split from the others in the group and now started his own. One of the reasons I left was because the mods here were becoming editors and making decisions on what could be posted. Axxo has an account on here and he could come and dispute whats posted is not his and that is the only way to determine it. But since he is not doing that.... Others trying to determine it is not the way of the internet.

Obviously just anyone releasing things using axxo to make a gain should not be allowed. But as long as its resonabely certain its not a scam we should let the market decide.
